mapper.select: select t_order_group.id , t_order_group.name , t_order_group.person_count , t_order_group.eia_factors , t_group_order.physical_type as physicalType, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as noAbnormalNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as otherAbnormalNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as tabooNum, SUM(CASE WHEN check_result = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as diseaseNum, SUM(CASE WHEN is_recheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as recheckNum from t_order_group LEFT JOIN t_group_person ON group_id = t_order_group.id LEFT JOIN t_group_order ON t_group_order.id = t_order_group.group_order_id where group_order_id = #{groupOrderId} AND t_group_order.id = #{groupOrderId} group by t_order_group.id

select t_order_group.* from t_order_group where del_flag = 0 and group_order_id = (select id from t_group_order where del_flag = 0 and pay_status = 1 and group_unit_id = #{groupUnitId} ORDER BY create_time limit 1)

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t1.name) AS physicalProject , GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT(a.path) SEPARATOR '|') AS hazardFactorsText FROM (SELECT * FROM t_order_group_item WHERE group_order_id = #{groupOrderId} ORDER BY order_num ASC) as t1 join (SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.path, '|', b.help_topic_id + 1), '|', -1) as path FROM (SELECT hazard_factors_text as path FROM t_group_person WHERE t_group_person.order_id = #{groupOrderId}) a JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < (LENGTH(a.path) - LENGTH(REPLACE(a.path, '|', '')) + 1)) a GROUP BY t1.group_order_id
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(t1.name) AS physicalProject FROM (SELECT * FROM t_order_group_item WHERE group_order_id = #{groupOrderId} ORDER BY order_num ASC) as t1 GROUP BY t1.group_order_id

SELECT REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(t_order_group.name, "[", 1),"|","、") AS hazardFactorsName, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(t_order_group.name, "[", -1), "]", 1) AS workStateName, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT t_order_group_item.`name`) AS projectDataName FROM t_order_group LEFT JOIN t_order_group_item ON t_order_group_item.group_id = t_order_group.id WHERE t_order_group.group_order_id = #{groupOrderId} and EXISTS(select id from t_group_person where del_flag = 0 and t_group_person.group_id = t_order_group.id) GROUP BY hazardFactorsName,workStateName

SELECT t_combo.id,SUBSTRING_INDEX(t_combo.hazard_factors_text, "[", 1) AS hazardFactorsName, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(t_combo.career_stage, "[", -1), "]", 1) AS workStateName
FROM t_combo
WHERE t_combo.del_flag = 0
and t_combo.id in
#{item}
GROUP BY t_combo.id

select REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(t_group_person.work_state_text, '\r', ''), '\n', ''),' ','') AS workStateName, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(t_group_person.hazard_factors_text, '\r', ''), '\n', ''),' ','') AS hazardFactorsName, t_group_person.check_result, t_group_person.person_name, t_inspection_record.conclusion, t_inspection_record.review_result, t_inspection_record.handle_opinion, t_inspection_record.other_check_abnormal_results, t_inspection_record.career_illness_name, t_group_person.group_id from t_group_person left join t_inspection_record on t_inspection_record.person_id = t_group_person.id where t_group_person.is_pass > 3 AND t_group_person.order_id = #{groupOrderId} and t_group_person.del_flag = 0

select REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(t_group_person.work_state_text, '\r', ''), '\n', ''),' ','') AS workStateName, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(t_group_person.hazard_factors_text, '\r', ''), '\n', ''),' ','') AS hazardFactorsName, t_review_project.name AS reviewName, t_review_person.check_result, t_group_person.person_name, t_inspection_record.conclusion, t_inspection_record.review_result, t_inspection_record.review_result_code, t_inspection_record.review_inspect_date, t_inspection_record.review_opinion, t_inspection_record.handle_opinion, t_inspection_record.other_check_abnormal_results, t_inspection_record.career_illness_name from t_review_person left join t_group_person on t_group_person.id = t_review_person.first_person_id left join t_inspection_record on t_inspection_record.person_id = t_review_person.id left join t_review_project on t_review_project.person_id = t_review_person.id where t_review_person.is_pass > 3 AND t_review_person.order_id = #{groupOrderId} GROUP BY t_review_person.id
